name: crowd-strike-falcon
label: CrowdStrike Falcon
description: The CrowdStrike Falcon® platform is pioneering cloud-delivered endpoint protection. It both delivers and unifies IT Hygiene, next-generation antivirus, endpoint detection and response (EDR), managed threat hunting, and threat intelligence — all delivered via a single lightweight agent.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the CrowdStrike Falcon server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Client ID
fields.description: Client ID used to access the CrowdStrike Falcon APIs and perform automated operations.
fields.name: client_id

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.description: Client Secret used to access the CrowdStrike Falcon APIs and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: client_secret

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create IOC
operations.description: Creates an indicator on CrowdStrike Falcon based on the IOC type and value, policy, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of indicator that you want to create on CrowdStrike Falcon.Valid types include: IPv4, IPv6, Domain, MD5, SHA1, and SHA256.

parameters.title: IOC Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.tooltip: The string representation of the indicator
parameters.description: String representation of the indicator that you want to create on CrowdStrike Falcon.The value that you specify will be based on the IOC Type you have chosen.

parameters.title: Policy
parameters.name: policy
parameters.tooltip: The policy that should be enacted when the value is detected on a host
parameters.description: Policy that should be enacted when the IOC value is detected on a host.Following is the list of policies:detect: Sends a notification when the particular indicator has been detected on a host.none: Take no action when the particular indicator has been detected on a host. This is equivalent to turning the indicator off.

parameters.title: Indicator Share Level
parameters.name: share_level
parameters.tooltip: Currently only 'red' share level is supported
parameters.description: (Optional) Level the indicator will be shared.Currently, only red share level (i.e., the indicator is not shared) is supported, which signifies that the IOC is not shared with other FH customers.

parameters.title: Time To Live
parameters.name: expiration_days
parameters.tooltip: Indicator lifetime in days
parameters.description: (Optional) Days until when the indicator remains valid.Note: This parameter only applies to Domain, IPv4, and IPv6 IOC types.

parameters.title: Indicator Source
parameters.name: source
parameters.description: (Optional) Source of origination of the indicator that you want to create on CrowdStrike Falcon. This can be used for tracking where this indicator was defined.Note: The indicator source is limited to 200 characters.

parameters.title: Indicator Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: (Optional) Description of the indicator that you want to create on CrowdStrike Falcon.Note: Description is limited to 200 characters.

operations.title: Get IOCs
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all IOCs or specific IOCs based on the input parameters you have specified from CrowdStrike Falcon

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: types
parameters.description: List containing the types of indicators whose IOC list you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon. You can select multiple indicator types.Valid types include: IPv4, IPv6, Domain, MD5, SHA1, and SHA256.

parameters.title: IOC Value
parameters.name: values
parameters.tooltip: CSV list of IOC values
parameters.description: List of indicator values based on the types that you have selected in the IOC Type field whose IOC list you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Policy
parameters.name: policies
parameters.tooltip: CSV list of policy
parameters.description: List of indicator policies whose associated IOCs you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Indicator Share Level
parameters.name: share_levels
parameters.tooltip: CSV list of indicator share level
parameters.description: (Optional) Level the indicator will be shared.Currently, only red share level (i.e., the indicator is not shared) is supported, which signifies that the IOC is not shared with other FH customers.

parameters.title: Indicator Source
parameters.name: sources
parameters.tooltip: CSV list of IOC sources
parameters.description: (Optional) List of IOC sources you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.Note: The indicator source is limited to 200 characters.

parameters.title: Earliest Expiration Date
parameters.name: from.expiration_timestamp
parameters.tooltip: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ (Eg. 2019-02-08T08:54:35.067Z)
parameters.description: (Optional)RFC3339 DateTime that represents the starting date range to search for IOCs on CrowdStrike Falcon by their expiration timestamp.

parameters.title: Latest Expiration Date
parameters.name: to.expiration_timestamp
parameters.tooltip: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ (Eg. 2019-02-08T08:54:35.067Z)
parameters.description: (Optional)RFC3339 DateTime that represents the ending date range to search for IOCs on CrowdStrike Falcon by their expiration timestamp.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of records to return
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of items to be returned in a single request.Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: The offset to begin the list from
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return.This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items.For example, if you specify 10 in this parameter, then the operation will start from the 10th record, then and return the list.

operations.title: Get IOC Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific IOC from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the IOC type and value you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: ioc_type
parameters.description: Type of the indicator whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.Valid types include: IPv4, IPv6, Domain, MD5, SHA1, and SHA256.

parameters.title: IOC Value
parameters.name: ioc_value
parameters.tooltip: Specify IOC value as per IOC type
parameters.description: String representation of the indicator whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.The value that you specify will be based on the IOC Type you have chosen.

operations.title: Update IOC
operations.description: Updates an indicator on CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the IOC type and value and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of indicator that you want to update on CrowdStrike Falcon.Valid types include: IPv4, IPv6, Domain, MD5, SHA1, and SHA256.

parameters.title: IOC Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.tooltip: The string representation of the indicator
parameters.description: String representation of the indicator that you want to update on CrowdStrike Falcon.The value that you specify will be based on the IOC Type you have chosen.

parameters.title: Policy
parameters.name: policy
parameters.tooltip: The policy that should be enacted when the value is detected on a host
parameters.description: (Optional)Policy that should be enacted when the IOC value is detected on a host.Following is the list of policies:detect: Sends a notification when the particular indicator has been detected on a host.none: Take no action when the particular indicator has been detected on a host. This is equivalent to turning the indicator off.

parameters.title: Indicator Share Level
parameters.name: share_level
parameters.tooltip: Currently only 'red' share level is supported
parameters.description: (Optional) Level the indicator will be shared.Currently, only red share level (i.e., the indicator is not shared) is supported, which signifies that the IOC is not shared with other FH customers.

parameters.title: Time To Live
parameters.name: expiration_days
parameters.tooltip: Indicator lifetime in days
parameters.description: (Optional) Days until when the indicator remains valid.Note: This parameter only applies to Domain, IPv4, and IPv6 IOC types.

parameters.title: Indicator Source
parameters.name: source
parameters.description: (Optional) Source of origination of the indicator that you want to update on CrowdStrike Falcon. This can be used for tracking where this indicator was defined.Note: The indicator source is limited to 200 characters.

parameters.title: Indicator Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: (Optional) Description of the indicator that you want to update on CrowdStrike Falcon.Note: Description is limited to 200 characters.

operations.title: Delete IOC
operations.description: Deletes an indicator on CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the IOC type and value you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of indicator that you want to delete from CrowdStrike Falcon.Valid types include: IPv4, IPv6, Domain, MD5, SHA1, and SHA256.

parameters.title: IOC Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.tooltip: The string representation of the indicator
parameters.description: String representation of the indicator that you want to delete from CrowdStrike Falcon.The value that you specify will be based on the IOC Type you have chosen.

operations.title: Hunt File
operations.description: Hunts a file on CrowdStrike Falcon using the filehash type and value you have specified.

parameters.title: Filehash Type
parameters.name: hash_type
parameters.description: Type of the filehash that you want to hunt for on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Filehash Value
parameters.name: hash_value
parameters.description: Value of the filehash that you want to hunt for on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Get Device Count Only
parameters.name: count_only
parameters.description: If you select this parameter, i.e., set it to True, then the response will contain only the number of devices found for that Filehash and value on CrowdStrike Falcon. For example, "device_count": 13If you clear this parameter, i.e., set it to False, then the response contains the list of device IDs found for that Filehash and value. For example, "resources": [ "1081290fbf104a1465cc0c91ca4ebe36", "739e412d9ff341a549a75e5c8107b0f3"])By default, this parameter is cleared, i.e., set as False.

operations.title: Hunt Domain
operations.description: Hunts a domain on CrowdStrike Falcon using the domain value you have specified. This operation retrieves a list of device IDs from CrowdStrike Falcon on which the domain was observed.

parameters.title: Domain
parameters.name: domain_value
parameters.description: Value of the domain that you want to hunt for on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Get Device Count Only
parameters.name: count_only
parameters.description: If you select this parameter, i.e., set it to True, then the response will contain only the number of devices found for that domain on CrowdStrike Falcon.If you clear this parameter, i.e., set it to False, then the response contains the list of device IDs found for that domain on CrowdStrike Falcon.By default, this parameter is cleared, i.e., set as False.

operations.title: Get Processes Related to IOC
operations.description: Retrieves a list of processes from CrowdStrike Falcon which are associated with the specified IOC on given device based on the IOC type and value, device ID, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of indicator whose associated processes you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.Valid types include: IPv4, IPv6, Domain, MD5, SHA1, and SHA256.

parameters.title: IOC Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.tooltip: The string representation of the indicator
parameters.description: String representation of the indicator whose associated processes you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.The value that you specify will be based on the IOC Type you have chosen.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: The device ID you want to specifically check against
parameters.description: ID of the device against which you want to check for IOCs and associated processes on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of records to return
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of items to be returned in a single request.Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: The offset to begin the list from
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return.This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items.

operations.title: Get Process Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific process from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the process ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Process ID
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: CSV list of ID of a process
parameters.description: ID of the process whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.This parameter allows you to send multiple IDs to the endpoint to allow for more efficient multi-get type operations.

operations.title: Get Device Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific device from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: CSV list of device ID
parameters.description: ID of the device whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.

operations.title: Get Endpoint List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the all endpoints or specific endpoints based on the input parameters you have specified configured on a device on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Query String
parameters.name: filter_str
parameters.tooltip: Filter query apply to get endpoint
parameters.description: Filter conditions based on which you want to filter the list of endpoints retrieved from CrowdStrike Falcon.All parameters listed under Detection Search API > Parameters can be used as filters.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: The offset to begin the list from
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return.This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of records to return
parameters.description: Number of items to be returned in a single request.Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.

operations.title: Contain the Host
operations.description: Prevents a potentially compromised host from communicating across the network that contains the host based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated device IDs or list of device IDs.
parameters.description: Comma-separated device IDs that needs to be quarantined from the network, i.e., the devices will now not be able to communicate across the network.

operations.title: Remove Containment
operations.description: Removes the containment on a host that has been contained and returns its network communications to normal based on the device IDs you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated detection IDs or list of detection IDs.
parameters.description: Comma-separated ID of the device IDs that needs to be un-quarantined from the network, i.e., the devices will now be able to communicate across the network.

operations.title: Get Detection Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific detection from CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the detection IDs you have specified.

parameters.title: Detection ID
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated detection IDs or list of detection IDs.
parameters.description: Comma-separated detection IDs or list of detection IDs whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.

operations.title: Detection Search
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all detection IDs or specific detection IDs based on the input parameters you have specified configured on a device on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: max_severity_displayname
parameters.description: Name used in the UI to determine the severity of the detection that you want to search on CrowdStrike Falcon. You can select multiple options.Valid values include: Critical, High, Medium, Low, and Informational.

parameters.title: Tactic
parameters.name: behaviors.tactic
parameters.description: Tactic for detection filtration on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Technique
parameters.name: behaviors.technique
parameters.placeholder: eg. Cloud Based ML, Sensor Based ML
parameters.description: Technique for detection filtration on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Time
parameters.name: last_behavior
parameters.description: Time, based on which you want to search for detections on CrowdStrike Falcon.You can choose from the following values: Last Hour, Last Day, Last Week, Last 30 days, and Last 90 days.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Current status of the detection that you want to search on CrowdStrike Falcon.You can select multiple options.Valid values include: New, In Progress, True Positive, False Positive, and Ignored.

parameters.title: Confidence
parameters.name: max_confidence
parameters.tooltip: Value can be any integer between 1-100.
parameters.description: When a detection has more than one associated behavior with varying confidence levels, this field captures the highest confidence value of all behaviors.You can specify any integer between 1-100 in this parameter.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort detection records sort by any of the following values: Date Updated, Last Behaviour Descending, and Last Behaviour Ascending

parameters.title: Triggering File
parameters.name: filename.raw
parameters.description: Name of the file that has triggered the process.

parameters.title: Assigned to
parameters.name: assigned_to_name
parameters.description: Human-readable name of the user to whom the detection is currently assigned.

parameters.title: General Search
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Full text search across all metadata fields.
parameters.description: Full-text search for detections across all metadata fields on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Query String
parameters.name: filter_str
parameters.description: Filter conditions based on which you want to filter the list of detections retrieved from CrowdStrike Falcon.All parameters listed under Detection Search API > Parameters can be used as filters.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of term buckets to be returned in a single request.Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return.This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items.

operations.title: Detection Aggregates
operations.description: Retrieves a count of detections by a query from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the aggregate query name and type, the field used to compute the aggregation and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Name of the aggregate query, as chosen by the user. Used to identify the results returned to you.
parameters.description: Name of the aggregate query, as specified by the user.The name parameter is used to identify the results returned to you.

parameters.title: Aggregate Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Type of aggregation
parameters.description: Type of aggregation whose count you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.Valid values include: Date Histogram, Date Range, Terms, Cardinality, Max, and Min.

parameters.title: Field
parameters.name: field
parameters.tooltip: The field on which to compute the aggregation
parameters.description: Field on which you want to compute the aggregation of detections.All parameters listed under Detection Search API > Parameters can be used as fields for computing aggregations.

parameters.title: Time Interval
parameters.name: interval
parameters.tooltip: If aggregate type is "Date Histogram Time" then time interval for date histogram aggregations is compulsory.
parameters.description: Time interval for date histogram aggregations.Valid values include: Year, Month, Week, Day, Hour, and Minute.

parameters.title: Query Filter String
parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter conditions based on which you want to filter the list of detections retrieved from CrowdStrike Falcon.All parameters listed under Detection Search API > Parameters can be used as filters.

parameters.title: General Search
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Full text search across all metadata fields.
parameters.description: Full-text search for detections across all metadata fields on CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Ranges
parameters.name: ranges
parameters.description: Applies to range aggregations. Ranges values that you can specify will depend on the field that you have specified.For example, if max_severity is used, ranges can look like [{"From": 0,"To": 70},{"From": 70,"To": 100}]

parameters.title: Missing
parameters.name: missing
parameters.description: Missing is the value to be used when the aggregation field is missing from the object/document. In other words, the missing parameter defines how documents that are missing the value should be treated.By default, they will be ignored, but it is also possible to treat them as if they had a value.

parameters.title: Min Doc Count
parameters.name: min_doc_count
parameters.tooltip: Only return buckets if values are greater than or equal to the value here.
parameters.description: Only return term buckets if values are greater than or equal to the value that you have specified in this parameter.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of term buckets to be returned in a single request.Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort detection aggregations based on the value specified in this parameter.

parameters.title: Sub Aggregates
parameters.name: sub_aggregates
parameters.description: Nested aggregation. You can specify a maximum of 3 nested aggregations per request.For example, "sub_aggregates" :[{"name": "max_first_behavior","type": "max","field": "first_behavior"}]"

operations.title: Update Detection
operations.description: Updates specific detections in CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the detection IDs and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Detection IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: CSV of detection IDs or list of detection IDs
parameters.description: IDs of the detections whose state you want to set on CrowdStrike Falcon.:Note: v2 of the CrowdStrike API, the CrowdStrike detection IDs are in the following format: ldt:[first field]:[second field] e.g. ldt:cf54bb61f92e4d3e75bf4f7c11fc8f74:4295536142 .

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status to which you want to transition the specific detections.Valid values include: New, In Progress, True Positive, False Positive, Ignored and Closed.

parameters.title: Assigned To
parameters.name: uid
parameters.tooltip: Username to assign the detections to. This is usually user's email address.
parameters.description: Names (email IDs) of users to whom you want to assign the specific detections. For example, example@example.com

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Used to provide context or notes for other Falcon users.
parameters.description: Comment to add detections that you want to update in CrowdStrike Falcon. Comments are displayed with the detection in Falcon and are usually added to provide context or notes.

parameters.title: Show in UI
parameters.name: show_in_ui
parameters.tooltip: Enable to displays the detection in the UI.
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set it to 'true' to display the detections in the UI.

operations.title: Search Incidents
operations.description: Searches for incidents in CrowdStrike Falcon based on the FQL filter, sorting, and pagination details you have specified.

parameters.title: Query String
parameters.name: filter_str
parameters.description: (Optional)Filter conditions based on which you want to filter the list of incidents retrieved from CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (Optional) Sort query that is used to perform the sorting operation over the result. In the sort query, specify the property to sort the results, followed by a dot (.), and then followed by the sort direction, either "asc" or "desc".

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.
parameters.description: (Optional) Number of items to be returned in a single request. Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1 and the maximum number of 500.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return. This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items. For example, if you specify 10 in this parameter, then the operation will start from the 10th record, then and return the list.

operations.title: Get Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves details for incidents from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the incident IDs you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated incident ids or list of incident ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated incident IDs or list of incident IDs whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.

operations.title: Get Incidents Crowdstrike Score
operations.description: Returns entity (incident) data by querying the complete CrowdStrike Score environment based on the timestamp and CrowdStrike you have specified.

parameters.title: Timestamp
parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.tooltip: The time at which the CrowdScore was calculated.
parameters.description: Time at which the CrowdStrike score was calculated based on which you want to retrieve information about the incidents.

parameters.title: CrowdStrike Score
parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Value of the CrowdStrike Score based on which you want to retrieve information about the incidents.

operations.title: Update Incidents Status
operations.description: Updates specific incidents in CrowdStrike Falcon, based on the incidents IDs and status you have specified.

parameters.title: Incident IDs
parameters.name: ids
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated incident ids or list of incident ids
parameters.description: Specify the comma-separated incident IDs or list of incident IDs whose status you want to update in CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Select the status to which you want to update the specified incidents. Valid status values include: New, In Progress, Ignored, or Closed.

operations.title: Get User ID
operations.description: Retrieves the user ID from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the username you have specified.

parameters.title: Username
parameters.name: uid
parameters.tooltip: This is usually the user's email address, but may vary based on your configuration.
parameters.description: Specify the username whose user ID you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon. This is usually the user's email address; however, this could vary based on your configuration. For example, test@example.com

operations.title: Get User Details
operations.description: Retrieves the details of a specific user from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the user ID you have specified.

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the user whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon.

operations.title: Get Usernames List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of usernames (usually an email address) for all users in your customer account from CrowdStrike Falcon.

operations.title: Get User IDs List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all user IDs in your customer account from CrowdStrike Falcon.

operations.title: Run Admin Command
operations.description: Executes admin commands on a specific device in CrowdStrike Falcon based on the device ID, commands, and optionally command parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: ID of the device on which you want to execute the specified admin command using CrowdStrike Falcon Real-Time Response (RTR).
parameters.tooltip: Device ID

parameters.title: Command
parameters.name: command
parameters.description: Valid commands that you want to execute on the specified device.
parameters.tooltip: Command to be run on the device.(Case Sensitive)

parameters.title: Command Argument
parameters.name: command_args
parameters.description: Command arguments that can be added to the specified commands as additional parameters.

parameters.title: Queue Offline
parameters.name: queue_offline
parameters.tooltip: Enable to run the command on offline host
parameters.description: Select this option, i.e., set to 'True', if you want to run the command on a host that is offline. By default, this option is cleared, i.e, set to 'False.'

operations.title: Get Admin Command Result
operations.description: Retrieves the result of the status of the admin command executed on a specific device from CrowdStrike Falcon Real-Time Response (RTR) based on the cloud request ID and sequence ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Cloud Request ID
parameters.name: cloud_request_id
parameters.description: ID of the request that is returned when you run the admin command on a specific device.

parameters.title: Sequence ID
parameters.name: sequence_id
parameters.description: ID of the sequence returned in the result content.

operations.title: Download Session File List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of the session files available for the download using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR based on the device ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: ID of the device whose associated session file list you want to download using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.
parameters.tooltip: Device ID

operations.title: Download Session File
operations.description: Downloads a specific session file using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR based on the device ID, the file's SHA256 values, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: ID of the device whose associated session file you want to download using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.

parameters.title: File's SHA256 Value
parameters.name: sha256
parameters.description: SHA256 value of the file that you want to download.
parameters.tooltip: SHA256 value

parameters.title: Download File Name
parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Name to be given to the downloaded file. The filename specified here will also be used to upload the file to the FortiSOAR™ "Attachments" module.

parameters.title: Additional Filter Parameters
parameters.name: extra_params
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional filter parameters that can be specified to search for the session file.

operations.title: Get Scripts List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of PowerShell scripts available for the "runscript" command from CrowdStrike Falcon. These scripts can then be run on devices using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: (Optional)FQL Filter based on which you want to filter PowerShell scripts. Based on the filter, this operation retrieves a list of PowerShell scripts from CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return.This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items.For example, if you specify 10 in this parameter, then the operation will start from the 10th record, then and return the list.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Limits the number of results to be returned in a single request.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (Optional) Sort query that is used to perform the sorting operation over the result. In the sort query, specify the property to sort the results, followed by a dot (.), and then followed by the sort direction, either "asc" or "desc".

operations.title: Get Scripts Details by IDs
operations.description: Retrieves the PowerShell scripts available for the "runscript" command from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the script ID you have specified. These scripts can then be run on devices using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.

parameters.title: Script File IDs
parameters.name: file_ids
parameters.description: ID of the script files whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon and which you want to run using the "runscript" command from CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.

operations.title: Get Executable List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of Executable available for the "runscript" command from CrowdStrike Falcon. These executables can then be run on devices using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: (Optional)FQL Filter based on which you want to filter Executable scripts. Based on the filter, this operation retrieves a list of Executable scripts from CrowdStrike Falcon.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item that this operation should return. This allows you to use a pagination token returned by the API to paginate a set of results and allows you to resume pagination without retrieving the already encountered items. For example, if you specify 10 in this parameter, then the operation will start from the 10th record, then and return the list.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Limits the number of results to be returned in a single request.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: (Optional) Sort query that is used to perform the sorting operation over the result. In the sort query, specify the property to sort the results, followed by a dot (.), and then followed by the sort direction, either "asc" or "desc".

operations.title: Get Executables Details by IDs
operations.description: Retrieves the executables available for the "runscript" command from CrowdStrike Falcon based on the executable file ID you have specified. These executables can then be run on devices using CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.

parameters.title: Executable File IDs
parameters.name: file_ids
parameters.description: ID of the executable files whose details you want to retrieve from CrowdStrike Falcon and which you want to run using the "runscript" command from CrowdStrike Falcon RTR.
